author: HemantMahawar
body:
[skip ci] Initial demo scripts
@joeyaiello ... created a new folder - demos ... cc @raghushantha

comments.author: joeyaiello
comments.body:
@andschwa does @HemantMahawar need to rebase to get the Travis build to pass? Or do we even care?

@KrisBash: Once this is merged, can you follow the same pattern for bringing your demos into the repo?

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: No, he needs to push a branch to the repo instead of a fork. We have a private repo, we can't run CI from forks with private repos.

title: Initial demo scripts for installation and PowerShellGet demos
